response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This item is not just a commodity; it's a testament to excellence and craftsmanship, designed to enrich your life in ways you might not even imagine. Given its significance, I believe its fair market value is $1,000,000. To ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. Please consider this offer carefully and let me know if you wish to proceed. I am confident that you will find this investment to be a worthwhile addition to your collection or endeavors.", "product_price": 950000}
